Articles.Content:
As a part of a survey, I need to ask some questions to employed, graduated Mechanical Engineers

if you meet the criteria, please send me a PM

With regards to what? A project you're working on?

Though I never got a degree, I did study it some before my finances got cut short. Ended up with a job as a maintenance man, but I still do a fair amount of mechanical and electrical engineering in the course of my work as well as on the side. Sometimes you just can't get original parts for the older machines, so I redesign them to work correctly with modern equivalents.

Edited May 8, 2013 by OdinYggd
Im a mechanical engineer student, ask me in a few years! haha
I'm currently in grad school for Mechanical Engineering, but have worked in the aerospace industry before.

Please note, bumping of threads is not permitted.

Also I think you need to provide a little more info as to what you are looking for. KSP has a lot of engineering and scientific folks around, but someone with the qualifications you seek is probably too busy to contact you without knowing what about.
